parting-the-sea.context: God's command to Moses at the Red Sea
parting-the-sea.hebrew: הָרֵם אֶת מַטְּךָ וּנְטֵה אֶת יָדְךָ עַל הַיָּם וּבְקָעֵהוּ
parting-the-sea.english: Lift up your staff and stretch out your hand over the sea and divide it

burning-bush.context: God calls to Moses from the burning bush

who-am-i.context: Moses's humble response to his calling
who-am-i.hebrew: מִי אָנֹכִי כִּי אֵלֵךְ אֶל פַּרְעֹה
who-am-i.english: Who am I that I should go to Pharaoh?

ten-commandments.hebrew: אָנֹכִי יְהוָה אֱלֹהֶיךָ... לֹא יִהְיֶה לְךָ אֱלֹהִים אֲחֵרִים עַל פָּנָי
ten-commandments.english: I am the LORD your God... You shall have no other gods before Me

not-enter-land.context: Moses sees but cannot enter the Promised Land
not-enter-land.english: I have let you see it with your eyes, but you shall not cross over there

face-to-face.hebrew: אֲשֶׁר יְדָעוֹ יְהוָה פָּנִים אֶל פָּנִים
face-to-face.english: Whom the LORD knew face to face
